summary: Love between the representatives of two warring tribes changes the balance of power on the whole remote island.
cast: Jason Scott Lee|Esai Morales|Sandrine Holt|Eru Potaka Dewes|Emilio Tuki Hito|Gordon Hatfield|Frenxa Reuben|Hori Ahipene|Chiefy Elkington|Ruihana Rewa|George Henare|Rawiri Paratene|Pete Smith|Mario Gaoa|Cliff Curtis|Willie Davis|Lawrence Makoare|Te Whatanui Skipwith|Nathaniel Lees|Grant McFarland|Wassie Shortland|Tania Simon|Rena Owen|Anzac Wallace|Rakai Karaitiana|Shane Dawson|Henry Vaeoso|Angela Gribben|Karaitiana Beazley|Jade Clayton|Jenni Heka|Pitake Tuki|Liseli Mutti|Michael Yost
title: Rapa Nui
